metadata.title: CVE-2016-10081 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
/usr/bin/shutter in Shutter through 0.93.1 allows user-assisted remoteattackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted image name that ismishandled during a "Run a plugin" action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10081` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

shutter - 0.94-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shutter package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.94-1').
